defects of a product to be disposed

Of course── It was never a question.
Should you find a piece of trash on your bed,
do you ever ask for permission to throw it away?
A case of liberalism against fundamentalism...
And the two sides are in conflict, yes?
Both of those claims are extreme.
I wish they could've been more flexible.
I guess it's a bit similar.
One side goes as far as to destroy
all that is for the sake of freedom,
the other gives up all freedom and lives
only for the sake of the world...
The circumstances of those two are different,
but I feel that there's a little overlap.
And which side do you think is correct?
I cannot tell which is correct.

So does that mean you're on Kaamos's side?

being a guide to the auditing process.

the people at the top say?

my assigned mission for my own sake.
